summary: Test module that validates the StableUnCLIP image generation pipeline. It includes fast unit tests using mocked components to check behaviours such as attention slicing and consistency between batch and single inference, as well as integration tests that run the full pipeline on GPU/CPU to verify basic generation and sequential CPU offloading.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the StableUnCLIP diffusion pipeline, enabling reliable deployment and continuous improvement of image generation features.
